windowsOSVersion.description: The Windows version for the VM. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Windows version. Allowed values: 2008-R2-SP1, 2012-Datacenter, 2012-R2-Datacenter.

vnetId.description: The Virtual Network that you want your VM to connect to, so that it can access a specific network, such as corp net etc.

userImageStorageAccountName.description: The Storage Account name that contains the image files

userImageStorageContainerName.description: The Storage Account Container name that contains the image file

userImageVhdName.description: This is the name of the customized VHD

domainName.description: The FQDN of the AD domain

appID.description: appID tag for the Virtual Machine.  See subscription document for how to get

orgID.description: orgID tag for the Virtual Machine.  See subscription document for how to get

env.description: environment tag for the Virtual Machine.  Production will come through as production.  Any other value or blank will be marked as Pre-Production

additionalAdmins.description: Additional admins that can login to the VMs
